text: One of our #BHRJ Editors-in-Chief @BizEthicsProf will be speaking on 10 Feb in this session about States, #Pharmaceutical Companies & #Covid19 #Vaccine Access. Great series hosted by the Oxford Business and Human Rights Network @OxBHRNetwork. Register here https://t.co/FTgpJ1N1cm https://t.co/qjohdDsWtg
